item.title: Using the VMware Content Libray Assistant Fling
item.description: So VMware Flings have been on a roll recently. They have released what they call “VMware Content Library Assistant.” This is a java based CLI app, that connects to your vCenter and searchers for your templates and then automatically creates and uploads them. You can find the fling at the following URL… https://labs.vmware.com/flings/vsphere-content-library-assistant) Once you download the fling, you can just run the following command. java -jar sphere-content-library-assistant-1.0.jar -s servername -u username -p password In my case my java home isn’t setup on my mac so I had to run the following command to get it to work.
